title: La Piazza
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Italian, Western, Beer/Wine, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Veg-friendly place in Banda Aceh serving Western and Asian foods. Many vegetarian choices on the menu, some could be made vegan upon request. Small pizzas loaded with veggies, plus veggie burger (ask if vegan), baba ghanouj. Pizza costs around 60,000 rupiah, other items 20-40,000. The locals call it simply "La Pizza." Previously located on Jl Bakti 33, Laksana.
